text:
are the worst sufferers. Unfortunate! Concerned division very well about this but everytime inspection on the locals & those creating mess are enjoying under the shades of few local officials.
Why not the proper mechanism for proper power supply in our area?
Once again

author: The Wanderer 🇮🇳
text: till date they didn't bother to install, as the site already selected by locality people and same visited by the L&T people. Your good self well aware about the shooting temperature & on that we have to spend hours & nights without power supply. For some of the illegal tenants we

author: The Wanderer 🇮🇳
text: 100's of times your department/sub division/division has been intimated regarding excessive load on 1 single transformer installed at Ward 55, Shankar Colony,Gangyal. Department gave clearance for installation of 1 additional transformer of 250KVA but before continuous request

author: The Wanderer 🇮🇳
text:
the only sound which is audible almost from every home this time.... Beep Beep Beep! Inverter Batteries🔋 almost dead😔
Humans became more useless than cattles. Almighty 🙏

author: The Wanderer 🇮🇳
text: Fans, Inverters, Chargers, Motors, Refrigerators and many more electrical appliances got damaged recently due to high voltage. As your good self directed the concerned but still no action taken yet. In this time it's very hard to take extra burden of finances like this. https://t.co/XU2Cr9qVwZ

The Wanderer 🇮🇳
text: Leave everything aside, Show #TheKashmirFiles to our Judiciary, to those Politicians, Bureaucrats, Media who made gimmick of our Genocide. Have your souls died? 32 years passed still it's hurting, painful, scary. Those who ruined us, killed us you invite them on High ☕ & on 🎥.

author: The Wanderer 🇮🇳
text:
#humthea #humhai #humrahaegae
Bow to You Man🙏👏🤲 @vivekagnihotri Ji @bhashasumbli 
#TheKashmirFiles 
Show those bolly roosters We Are Alive, and this is not your Masala & Appeased like Movie 🙏

author: The Wanderer 🇮🇳
text:
SOUL? Genocide happened in your own Country, lakhs of people of one particular community were thrown out from there State,from their Roots still you remained MUTE SPECTATOR😔 and hide the truth too. SHAME. 
It's Heart Wrenching, that's my story, your story, KP's story.

author: The Wanderer 🇮🇳
text:
The pain was more brutal,merciless, inhumane which the then Politicians, Bureaucrats, Media, Human Rights gave. Their SILENCE🤐. That's was more painful. We were Ripped badly but they didn't utter any single word.
Decades passed still you remain SILENT, Why? Are you born without

text:
One of my friends comment on my story, our story, KP's story @vivekagnihotri Ji... Many and many people of this Nation are now going to know the truth behind our exodus/genocide. Thanking You again 🙏
More & more power to you🤲
